channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: July 30, 2025 Today's Verse 1 John 4:9 [9] In this the love of God was made manifest among us, that God sent his only Son into the world, so that we might live through him. This Year's Memory Verses Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
